title: Stuffed Crimini Mushrooms with Gruyere
ingredients: ['36 crimini mushrooms, stems removed', '125ml (4 fl oz) olive oil', '400g (14 oz) chopped onion', '5 tablespoons minced shallot', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons chopped flat leaf parsley', '40g (1 1/2 oz) chopped fresh chives', '75ml (3 fl oz) lemon juice', '90g (3 1/2 oz) fresh breadcrumbs', '150g (5 oz) grated Gruyere cheese']
